item.title: Default version of QuickTree changed from 2.5-GCC-11.3.0 to 2.5-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of QuickTree changed from 2.5-GCC-11.3.0 to 2.5-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of pauvre changed from 0.2.3-gimkl-2020a-Python-3.8.2 to 0.2.3-gimkl-2020a-Python-3.8.2.
Default version of BamTools changed from 2.5.1-gimkl-2018b to 2.5.1-gimkl-2018b.
Default version of QUAST changed from 5.0.2-gimkl-2018b to 5.2.0-foss-2023a.
Default version of QUAST changed from 5.0.2-gimkl-2018b to 5.2.0-foss-2023a.
Default version of BEDTools changed from 2.28.0-gimkl-2018b to 2.31.1-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of BEDTools changed from 2.28.0-gimkl-2018b to 2.31.1-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of MultiQC changed from 1.13-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.13-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of NanoPlot changed from 1.41.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.41.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of TSEBRA changed from 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of TSEBRA changed from 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of binutils changed from 2.27-GCCcore-6.3.0 to 2.26-GCCcore-5.4.0.
Default version of Flye changed from 2.9.3-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.11.3 to 2.9.5-foss-2023a-Python-3.11.6.
FileSender has been added.
item.description:
Send large files quickly and securely using REANNZ FileSender. https://www.reannz.co.nz/products-and-services/filesender/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load FileSender/2.49.0-foss-2023a

item.title: libsodium has been added.
item.description:
library for encryption, decryption, signatures, password hashing and more. https://doc.libsodium.org/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load libsodium/1.0.18

item.title: NextPolish2 has been added.
item.description:
a fast and efficient genome polishing tool for long-read assembly https://github.com/Nextomics/NextPolish2 This new module can be loaded with 
module load NextPolish2/0.2.1-foss-2023a

item.title: matlab-proxy has been added.
item.description:
Python package which enables you to launch MATLAB and access it from a web browser. https://github.com/mathworks/matlab-proxy This new module can be loaded with 
module load matlab-proxy/0.23.1-foss-2023a

item.title: BreakDancer has been removed.
item.description:
BreakDancer has been removed and can no longer be accessed via 
module load BreakDancer/

item.title: Default version of Basilisk has changed
item.description: The default version of Basilisk has changed from 20200620-gimpi-2020 to 20180226-gimpi-2018b, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Basilisk. If you wish to continue using 20200620-gimpi-2020 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Basilisk/20200620-gimpi-2020

item.title: globus-compute-endpoint/2.30.1-foss-2023a-Python-3.11.6 added.
item.description:
globus-compute-endpoint has been updated with a new version, 2.30.1-foss-2023a-Python-3.11.6. 
module load globus-compute-endpoint/2.30.1-foss-2023a-Python-3.11.6/

item.title: Default version of globus-compute-endpoint has changed
item.description: The default version of globus-compute-endpoint has changed from 2.24.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 2.24.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load globus-compute-endpoint. If you wish to continue using 2.24.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load globus-compute-endpoint/2.24.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5

item.title: Default version of GDAL has changed
item.description: The default version of GDAL has changed from 3.0.4-gimkl-2020a.lua to 2.2.2-gimkl-2017a-GEOS-3.5.1, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load GDAL. If you wish to continue using 3.0.4-gimkl-2020a.lua in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load GDAL/3.0.4-gimkl-2020a.lua

item.title: Default version of Trinity has changed
item.description: The default version of Trinity has changed from 2.8.4-gimkl-2017a.lua to 2.13.2-gimkl-2020a, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Trinity. If you wish to continue using 2.8.4-gimkl-2017a.lua in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Trinity/2.8.4-gimkl-2017a.lua

item.title: Default version of EasyBuild has changed
item.description: The default version of EasyBuild has changed from 4.7 to 4.8.1, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load EasyBuild. If you wish to continue using 4.7 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load EasyBuild/4.7

item.description:
modkit has been updated with a new version, 0.4.1-GCC-12.3.0.
